javacsw.services.alarms

Interface IAlarmService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JAlarmService

    public interface IAlarmService
    Defines the Java API to the Alarm Service

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String defaultName
      The default name that the Alarm Service is registered with
      static int defaultRefreshSecs
      An alarm's severity should be refreshed every defaultRefreshSecs seconds to make sure it does not expire and become "Disconnected" (after maxMissedRefresh missed refreshes)
      static int maxMissedRefresh
      The default number of refreshes that may be missed before an alarm's severity is expired and becomes "Disconnected"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ComponentId alarmServiceComponentId(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the AlarmService ComponentId for the given, or default name
      static Connection.TcpConnection alarmServiceConnection()
      Returns the AlarmService connection for the given, or default name
      static Connection.TcpConnection alarmServiceConnection(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the AlarmService connection for the given, or default name
      static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<IAlarmService> getAlarmService(akka.actor.ActorRefFactory system, akka.util.Timeout timeout)
      Looks up the Redis instance for the Alarm Service with the Location Service and then returns an IAlarmService instance using it.
      static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<IAlarmService> getAlarmService(java.lang.String asName, akka.actor.ActorRefFactory system, akka.util.Timeout timeout)
      Looks up the Redis instance for the Alarm Service with the Location Service and then returns an IAlarmService instance using it.
      static IAlarmService getAlarmService(java.lang.String host, int port, akka.actor.ActorRefFactory sys)
      Returns an IAlarmService instance using the Redis instance at the given host and port
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<scala.Unit> setSeverity(AlarmKey alarmKey, AlarmModel.SeverityLevel severity)
      Sets and publishes the severity level for the given alarm

    • Field Detail

      • defaultName

        static final java.lang.String defaultName
        The default name that the Alarm Service is registered with

      • defaultRefreshSecs

        static final int defaultRefreshSecs
        An alarm's severity should be refreshed every defaultRefreshSecs seconds to make sure it does not expire and become "Disconnected" (after maxMissedRefresh missed refreshes)

      • maxMissedRefresh

        static final int maxMissedRefresh
        The default number of refreshes that may be missed before an alarm's severity is expired and becomes "Disconnected"

    • Method Detail

      • setSeverity

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<scala.Unit> setSeverity(AlarmKey alarmKey,
                                                               AlarmModel.SeverityLevel severity)
        Sets and publishes the severity level for the given alarm
        Parameters:
        alarmKey - the key for the alarm
        severity - the new value of the severity
        Returns:
        a future indicating when the operation has completed

      • getAlarmService

        static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<IAlarmService> getAlarmService(java.lang.String asName,
                                                                             akka.actor.ActorRefFactory system,
                                                                             akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Looks up the Redis instance for the Alarm Service with the Location Service and then returns an IAlarmService instance using it.

        Note: Applications using the Location Service should call LocationService.initialize() once before accessing any Akka or Location Service methods.

        Parameters:
        asName - name used to register the Redis instance with the Location Service (default: "Alarm Service")
        system - the Akka system or context, needed for working with futures and actors
        timeout - amount of time to wait when looking up the alarm service with the location service
        Returns:
        a new JAlarmService instance

      • getAlarmService

        static IAlarmService getAlarmService(java.lang.String host,
                                     int port,
                                     akka.actor.ActorRefFactory sys)
        Returns an IAlarmService instance using the Redis instance at the given host and port
        Parameters:
        host - the Redis host name or IP address
        port - the Redis port
        Returns:
        a new IAlarmService instance

      • getAlarmService

        static java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<IAlarmService> getAlarmService(akka.actor.ActorRefFactory system,
                                                                             akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Looks up the Redis instance for the Alarm Service with the Location Service and then returns an IAlarmService instance using it.

        Note: Applications using the Location Service should call LocationService.initialize() once before accessing any Akka or Location Service methods.

        Parameters:
        system - the Akka system or context, needed for working with futures and actors
        timeout - amount of time to wait when looking up the alarm service with the location service
        Returns:
        a new JAlarmService instance

      • alarmServiceComponentId

        static ComponentId alarmServiceComponentId(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the AlarmService ComponentId for the given, or default name

      • alarmServiceConnection

        static Connection.TcpConnection alarmServiceConnection()
        Returns the AlarmService connection for the given, or default name

      • alarmServiceConnection

        static Connection.TcpConnection alarmServiceConnection(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the AlarmService connection for the given, or default name
